text: Shawn Colvin (born January 10, 1956 in Vermillion, South Dakota) is a singer- songwriter and a musician. She began her career in the 1980s, though it was not until 1997 that she became mainstream: her song "Sunny Came Home" (from her album A Few Small Repairs) was number one on the Billboard Adult Pop Songs chart in August 1997. Colvin released more records during the late 1990s, 2000s and 2010s. ==References== Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American pop musicians Category:Singers from South Dakota Category:Musicians from South Dakota Category:Writers from South Dakota Category:1956 births Category:Living people
title: Shawn Colvin
